```{r}
library(mosaic)
```


```{r}
# Initializing the dataset to a variable
math.students = CoyleSans22
```

```{r}
# Manipulating the names of the columns so they are easier to call in the future
math.students = math.students %>% 
  rename(
    id = 'ID', 
    term = 'Term',
    course.name = 'Course Name',
    section.name = 'Section Name',
    current.status = 'Current Status',
    verif.grade = 'Verif Grade',
    actual.grade = 'Actual Grade'
    
  )
```

```{r}
data.list <- split(math.students, f = math.students$id)
```

```{r}
nrow(data.list[[1]])
```

```{r}
for(i in length(data.list)) {
  if(nrow(data.list[[i]]) > 2) {
    print("greater than")
  }
}
```
